title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: Electric Bikes | e-MTB | Electric Bicycles | Mid drive ebikes | Hub drive e-bikes | E-bike adventure
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

title: Giant Trance X Advanced E + 1  for sale
text:
Giant Trance X Advanced E+1 or sale.  Bike was bought in March of this year, so is till under guarantee.  This is the link to the bike:

https://www.giant-bicycles.com/za/trance-x-advanced-eplus-1





The bike has a full carbon frame and is stock other than the following additions:


SRAM AXS 1x12 shifting.  This was moved across from my previous bike.
Front chainring is 34 tooth
Raceface Carbon bars cut to 780mm width
Brooks B17 carved short saddle.
https://www.brooksengland.com/en_row/b17-carved-short.html

Included in the sale is the Giant EnergyPak PLUS 240Wh battery.  The battery simply clips onto the bike frame and plugs into the bike charging port.  I have added Gorilla Tape to the cable for extra protection.  I have also modified the water bottle holder plate to take two CO2 bombs.



Front tyre is the Vitorria MAZZA 29x2.6 with the trail casing
Rear tyre is the Maxxis Disector 3C EXO +, MaxTerra 29x2.6
Both tyres are in good condition.


The Fox Live fork and shock run off the bike battery so no separate batteries required.



The bike has done 1169km and has had 13 charges.

title: Children's Cycling Club
text: PINNACLE CYCLING is a cycling group for children that runs for 4 Saturdays a month. Our rides take place in the afternoons so as not to clash with school sport, however does move earlier in the holidays. Our group rides take place at common mountain biking routes such as Bisley Park, Mountain View, Hilton forests, Cascades Mountain bike park and Alex Track. We focus on outrides to build indurance as well as interval based training to build strength for the longer rides.We like to also swap some Saturdays from a ride to a hike which we found builds better team dynamics and adds to the childrens overall fitness.Pinnacle Cycling is Club with a monthly fee of R400-00 per child with a once off joining fee of R150-00 per child. The monthly fee is always paid up in advance on the 25th of every month, no later than the 26th.Upon joining, each child is required to complete 3 forms:Registration FormPayment FormPhoto Consent FormThese forms will be sent to you and need to be completed and the hard copy given at the first session.Each rider is required to have:- A Mountain bike with front shocks (not a BMX bike)- Closed shoes (Takkies or cleats)- Tube repair kit- Spare bike tube- Sunglasses for eye protection- SABS approved Helmet (No Helmet, No Ride, No Exceptions)Pinnacle Cycling also holds holiday events that are charged separately. This is where we focus a lot on team building, activities and some more on fitness and skills.
